page.title: 20PEOPLE WHO HELPED
page.content: The information on this disk was coll- ected and stored by Class l from Dev- oran C P School. Those bodies who gave us help were:- Perran-ar-Worthal C P School Perran-ar-Worthal Womens Institute The Secretary for Education,Cornwall Carnon Consolidated Ltd Ministry of Agriculture, Fisheries & Food British Telecom James Wharram Designs Institute of Cornish Studies Carnon Downs Surgery Mount Wellington Mine. Many parents and several teachers also gave a great deal of help and assisted with transport. The children wrote letters,interviewed people and condensed information so collected.
